title: John Goodman shows off weight loss on red carpet
text:
John Goodman shows off weight loss on red carpet 63-year-old actor attends London premiere of 'Trumbo' POSTED: 11:29 AM MDT Oct 09, 2015 UPDATED: 11:34 AM MDT Oct 09, 2015 Tweet Valerie Macon/Getty Images, John Phillips/Getty Images for BFI John Goodman took to the red carpet in London on Thursday to promote his new movie while also showing off his newly slimmed-down look. Related Content Greatest TV characters you never saw Goodman's appearance at the British premiere of "Trumbo" at the BFI London Film Festival was just the latest glimpse of his recent weight loss. He showed off a similar svelte look at the movie's premiere at the Toronto Film Festival last month (as seen in the image below). 
The 63-year-old actor best known for the sitcom "Roseanne" as well as movie roles in "Monsters, Inc.," "The Big Lebowski" and "Argo," has seen his weight fluctuate over the years. 
He told David Letterman during a "Late Show" appearance in 2011 that he topped out around 400 pounds at his heaviest after developing an unhealthy eating cycle while on "Roseanne." Distributed by LAKANA. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed. Recommended
